headline: What Catalysts Are Shaping the Changing Narrative for Philip Morris International?
summary: Philip Morris International’s consensus analyst price target has decreased slightly from $190.20 to $188.00, highlighting a modest shift in sentiment among market watchers. This minor adjustment comes as analysts balance the company’s encouraging sales performance with emerging concerns about near-term profit guidance. Stay tuned to learn how you can keep abreast of new developments as the narrative for Philip Morris International’s stock continues to evolve. What Wall Street Has Been...
